title: Gustavo Dávila
text:
Gustavo Dávila (July 9, 1985 – June 30, 2014) was a <a href="Colombian%20people">Colombian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. His last club was <a href="Patriotas%20F.C.">Patriotas</a>.
Death.
On 30 June 2014, Dávila drowned in the Guachinte River near <a href="Jamund%C3%AD">Jamundí</a>.
